i5.las2peer.services.servicePackage.datamodel

Class DatabaseHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • i5.las2peer.services.servicePackage.datamodel.MySqlOpenHelper
      • i5.las2peer.services.servicePackage.datamodel.DatabaseHandler

  • public class DatabaseHandler
extends MySqlOpenHelper
    A Database handler to do CRUD operations on the Database. Database is created if not present when fetching connection source.
    Author:
    sathvik

    • Constructor Detail

      • DatabaseHandler

        public DatabaseHandler(java.lang.String dbName,
                       java.lang.String username,
                       java.lang.String password)
        Parameters:
        dbName - A database name to be used during the current session.
        username - A username for the database. (This is static during development)
        password - A password for the database. (This is static during development)

    • Method Detail

      • addPosts

        public void addPosts(java.util.ArrayList<Resource> posts)
              throws java.sql.SQLException
        Method to add the post containing user activity details into database table. This method is called after all the posts have been collected into a list by a parser such as XML or CSV parser.
        Parameters:
        posts - A list of posts and the details of the posts to be inserted.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - If database is not open to insert posts or does not comply to table constraints.

      • addUsers

        public void addUsers(java.util.ArrayList<User> users)
              throws java.sql.SQLException
        Method to add user details into "user" table in the database. This method is called after collecting user information is collected into as list by a parser such as XML or CSV parser.
        Parameters:
        users - A list of users and their information to be inserted.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - If database is not open to insert users or does not comply to table constraints.

      • addSemanticTags

        public void addSemanticTags()
                     throws java.sql.SQLException
        Method to add semantic information about the post into "semantics" table in the database. This method is called to add semantic information for each post in the database. All the posts are iterated and a web service is used to retrieve semantic data.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - If database is not open to insert semantic tags or does not comply to table constraints.
        See Also:
        SemanticTagger.getSemanticData()

      • getUserDAOs

        public java.util.List<UserEntity> getUserDAOs()
                                       throws java.sql.SQLException
        Queries for all the user rows and creates a DAO object by ORMLite The DAO object is used across the application.
        Returns:
        List of UserEntity Objects containing user properties.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
        See Also:
        UserEntity

      • markExpertsForEvaluation

        public void markExpertsForEvaluation(com.j256.ormlite.support.ConnectionSource connectionSrc)
                              throws java.sql.SQLException
        A helper method used to mark the probable expert in the database. It will be used during evaluation and this marks the ground truth value. This method iterates all the users and retrieves reputation value for the user. If corresponding reputation is above 98 percentile, it is marked as probable expert.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
